## Branch 

- Branch name: `feature/<scope>`
- Example:
  - [feature/component_sniffer](../tree/feature/component_sniffer)   
      
## Summary

Briefly describe what this feature is and why it is needed.

## Check List

* Right Menu
- [ ] Labels assigned
- [ ] Project added (if applicable)
- [ ] Milestone assigned
- [ ] Issue â†” PR relationship defined

## ðŸ”— Pull Request Guide

When creating a Pull Request for this issue,      
**link it by adding one of the following keywords in the PR description**:         
**remove branch (optional)**  

<br/>

```md
Closes #<issue-number>
Fixes #<issue-number>
Resolves #<issue-number>
```
